sql: INSERT INTO printerdata (component, status , liferemaining, estpages, estdays, printerurl) VALUES ($val1, $val2, $val3,$val4, $val5, $val6)
name: into_sqldata
prepare-params
select all
func:
msg.topic = "select component, status, liferemaining, estpages, estdays, printerurl, timestamp from printerdata";
return msg;

name: table-setup

rules.to: payload.*. {	    "component": component,	    "status": status,	    "liferemaining": $replace(liferemaining,  /[^0-9]/,""),	    "estpages": estpages,	    "estdays": estdays,	    "printerurl": printerurl,	    "timestamp": timestamp	    	}

name: sql_check_thresholds

temp: ts, printerurl, component, status, liferemaining, estdays, estpages

name: sql_check_thresholds
sql_check_thresholds
sql_check_thresholds
select all
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT MAX(timestamp), printerurl, component, estdays, status, liferemaining, estdays, estpages FROM printerdata WHERE component IS NOT NULL GROUP BY printerurl, component";
return msg;

name: Write SQL statements
label: select MAX(timestamp) as date, printerurl, component, status, liferemaining, estpages, estdays from printerdata where component like '%oner%' AND liferemaining < 30 group by printerurl, component

name: Set-up name-value map

props.v: [{"value":"select * from printerdata limit 10","label":"limit10"},{"value":"select * from printerdata where estdays < 10 limit 10","label":"estdays < 10"},{"value":"select printerurl, MIN(timestamp) as mintime, MAX(timestamp) as maxtime from printerdata group by printerurl","label":"first and last printerurl record"}]

name: Number of components below threshold values in the last 24 hours
